page.title: 15FRC DEPOT
page.content: The FRC Depot in Carnock Road is the Roads Depot for Dunfermline District. There are also Water and Drainage Depots in the area. Every vehicle has its own radio for contact with the offices. In winter, which is the busiest time of year, there are two shifts _ day shift and night shift. The workforce of ninety includes mechanics, foremen, drivers and office workers.In winter some of the lorries are fitted with snow ploughs to clear roads that are blocked with snow. Gritters are called out to grit roads when the tempature falls below a certain number of degrees. This helps to prevent accidents on icy roads. The lorries supply tar and tools for road mending. The JCB digs out ditches, tracks and drainage channels.
